name: Kindred Vale
storyline: The Spirits and humans of Kindred Vale lived in harmony for many years before a tragic rift came between them. Ever since, more and more of the town has slipped into the magical fogs the folkloric creatures use to protect their home. This divide has led people to lose touch with the spirits. You, alone, can still see them all, interact with and communicate with them. You have the chance to mend old wounds and rebuild the trust that has been lost. It is up to you to bring the two communities back together.
summary: Embark on a heart-warming journey to the alpine town of Kindred Vale. Discover mystic spirits and restore their trust. Use their magic to explore the breath-taking mountains, to gather, craft, and forge strong relationships with those you meet along the way to return the town to its former charm.
